dialogue.text: The question has become my teacher, my companion, my dance partner in the ballroom of consciousness.

visual_elements.metaphorical_overlay: Park as ballroom, walking as dancing

psychological_notes: Complete transformation of relationship with existential questioning. From adversarial to collaborative, from problem to partnership. The dance metaphor captures the dynamic, reciprocal nature of conscious engagement with mystery. Evan has learned to move with rather than against uncertainty.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness as collaborative dance with its own questioning
therapeutic_direction: Full integrationâ€”question as life-long companion rather than problem to solve
